verses.verse: Then Joseph <WH3130> came <WH935> and told <WH5046> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and said, <WH559> My father <WH1> and my brothers, <WH251> and their flocks, <WH6629> and their herds, <WH1241> and all <WH3605> that they have, are come <WH935> out of the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667> and, behold, <WH2009> they are in the land <WH776> of Goshen. <WH1657>
And he took <WH3947> some <WH7097> of his brothers, <WH251> even five <WH2568> men, <WH582> and presented <WH3322> them to Pharaoh. <WH6547>

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> What <WH4100> is your occupation? <WH4639> And they said <WH559> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> Your servants <WH5650> are shepherds, <WH7462> <WH6629> both <WH1571> we, and also <WH1571> our fathers. <WH1>

They said <WH559> morever to Pharaoh, <WH6547> For to sojourn <WH1481> in the land <WH776> are we come; <WH935> for your servants <WH5650> have no <WH369> pasture <WH4829> for their flocks; <WH6629> for the famine <WH7458> is sore <WH3515> in the land <WH776> of Canaan: <WH3667> now <WH6258> therefore, we pray <WH4994> you, let your servants <WH5650> dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Goshen. <WH1657>
And Pharaoh <WH6547> spoke <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> saying, <WH559> Your father <WH1> and your brothers <WH251> are come <WH935> to you:

The land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> is before <WH6440> you; in the best <WH4315> of the land <WH776> make your father <WH1> and brothers <WH251> to dwell; <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657> let them dwell: <WH3427> and if <WH518> you know <WH3045> any men <WH582> of activity <WH2428> among them, then make <WH7760> them rulers <WH8269> over <WH5921> my cattle. <WH4735>
And Joseph <WH3130> brought <WH935> in Jacob <WH3290> his father, <WH1> and set <WH5975> him before <WH6440> Pharaoh: <WH6547> and Jacob <WH3290> blessed <WH1288> Pharaoh. <WH6547>
And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> to Jacob, <WH3290> How <WH4100> old <WH3113> are you?

And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> The days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of my pilgrimage <WH4033> are an hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years: <WH8141> few <WH4592> and evil <WH7451> have the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of my life <WH2416> been, <WH1961> and have not attained <WH5381> to the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of my fathers <WH1> in the days <WH3117> of their pilgrimage. <WH4033>
And Jacob <WH3290> blessed <WH1288> Pharaoh, <WH6547> and went <WH3318> out from before <WH6440> Pharaoh. <WH6547>

And Joseph <WH3130> placed <WH3427> his father <WH1> and his brothers, <WH251> and gave <WH5414> them a possession <WH272> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> in the best <WH4315> of the land, <WH776> in the land <WH776> of Rameses, <WH7486> as Pharaoh <WH6547> had commanded. <WH6680>

And Joseph <WH3130> nourished <WH3557> his father, <WH1> and his brothers, <WH251> and all <WH3605> his father's <WH1> household, <WH1004> with bread, <WH3899> according <WH6310> to their families. <WH2945>

And there was no <WH369> bread <WH3899> in all <WH3605> the land; <WH776> for the famine <WH7458> was very <WH3966> sore, <WH3515> so that the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> and all the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> fainted <WH3856> by reason <WH6440> of the famine. <WH7458>

And Joseph <WH3130> gathered <WH3950> up all <WH3605> the money <WH3701> that was found <WH4672> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> for the corn <WH7668> which <WH834> they bought: <WH7666> and Joseph <WH3130> brought <WH935> the money <WH3701> into Pharaoh's <WH6547> house. <WH1004>

And when money <WH3701> failed <WH8552> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> all <WH3605> the Egyptians <WH4714> came <WH935> to Joseph, <WH3130> and said, <WH559> Give <WH3051> us bread: <WH3899> for why <WH4100> should we die <WH4191> in your presence? <WH5048> for the money <WH3701> fails. <WH656>
And Joseph <WH3130> said, <WH559> Give <WH3051> your cattle; <WH4735> and I will give <WH5414> you for your cattle, <WH4735> if <WH518> money <WH3701> fail. <WH656>

And they brought <WH935> their cattle <WH4735> to Joseph: <WH3130> and Joseph <WH3130> gave <WH5414> them bread <WH3899> in exchange for horses, <WH5483> and for the flocks, <WH6629> and for the cattle <WH4735> of the herds, <WH1241> and for the asses: <WH2543> and he fed <WH5095> them with bread <WH3899> for all <WH3605> their cattle <WH4735> for that year. <WH8141>

When that year <WH8141> was ended, <WH8552> they came <WH935> to him the second <WH8145> year, <WH8141> and said <WH559> to him, We will not hide <WH3582> it from my lord, <WH113> how that our money <WH3701> is spent; <WH8552> my lord <WH113> also has <WH413> our herds <WH4735> of cattle; <WH929> there is not ought left <WH7604> in the sight <WH6440> of my lord, <WH113> but our bodies, <WH1472> and our lands: <WH127>

Why <WH4100> shall we die <WH4191> before your eyes, <WH5869> both <WH1571> we and our land? <WH127> buy <WH7069> us and our land <WH127> for bread, <WH3899> and we and our land <WH127> will be servants <WH5650> to Pharaoh: <WH6547> and give <WH5414> us seed, <WH2233> that we may live, <WH2421> and not die, <WH4191> that the land <WH127> be not desolate. <WH3456>

And Joseph <WH3130> bought <WH7069> all <WH3605> the land <WH127> of Egypt <WH4714> for Pharaoh; <WH6547> for the Egyptians <WH4714> sold <WH4376> every man <WH376> his field, <WH7704> because <WH3588> the famine <WH7458> prevailed <WH2388> over <WH5921> them: so the land <WH776> became <WH1961> Pharaoh's. <WH6547>
And as for the people, <WH5971> he removed <WH5674> them to cities <WH5892> from one end <WH7097> of the borders <WH1366> of Egypt <WH4714> even to the other end <WH7097> thereof.

Only <WH7535> the land <WH127> of the priests <WH3548> bought <WH7069> he not; for the priests <WH3548> had a portion <WH2706> assigned them of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and did eat <WH398> their portion <WH2706> which <WH834> Pharaoh <WH6547> gave <WH5414> them: why <WH5921> <WH3651> they sold <WH4376> not their lands. <WH127>

Then Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> Behold, <WH2009> I have bought <WH7069> you this day <WH3117> and your land <WH127> for Pharaoh: <WH6547> see, <WH1887> here is seed <WH2233> for you, and you shall sow <WH2232> the land. <WH127>

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass in the increase, <WH8393> that you shall give <WH5414> the fifth <WH2549> part to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and four <WH702> parts <WH3027> shall be your own, for seed <WH2233> of the field, <WH7704> and for your food, <WH400> and for them of your households, <WH1004> and for food <WH398> for your little <WH2945> ones.
And they said, <WH559> You have saved our lives: <WH2421> let us find <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of my lord, <WH113> and we will be Pharaoh's <WH6547> servants. <WH5650>

And Joseph <WH3130> made <WH7760> it a law <WH2706> over <WH5921> the land <WH127> of Egypt <WH4714> to this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> that Pharaoh <WH6547> should have the fifth <WH2569> part, except <WH7535> the land <WH127> of the priests <WH3548> only, <WH905> which became <WH1961> not Pharaoh's. <WH6547>

And Israel <WH3478> dwelled <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> in the country <WH776> of Goshen; <WH1657> and they had possessions <WH270> therein, and grew, <WH6509> and multiplied <WH7235> exceedingly. <WH3966>

And Jacob <WH3290> lived <WH2421> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> seventeen <WH7651> <WH6240> years: <WH8141> so the whole age <WH3117> of Jacob <WH3290> was an hundred <WH3967> forty <WH705> and seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>

And the time <WH3117> drew near <WH7126> that Israel <WH3478> must die: <WH4191> and he called <WH7121> his son <WH1121> Joseph, <WH3130> and said <WH559> to him, If <WH518> now <WH4994> I have found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in your sight, <WH5869> put, <WH7760> I pray <WH4994> you, your hand <WH3027> under <WH8478> my thigh, <WH3409> and deal <WH6213> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with me; bury <WH6912> me not, I pray <WH4994> you, in Egypt: <WH4714>

But I will lie <WH7901> with my fathers, <WH1> and you shall carry <WH5375> me out of Egypt, <WH4714> and bury <WH6912> me in their burial plot. <WH6913> And he said, <WH559> I will do <WH6213> as you have said. <WH1697>
And he said, <WH559> Swear <WH7650> to me. And he swore <WH7650> to him. And Israel <WH3478> bowed <WH7812> himself on the bed's <WH4296> head. <WH7218>
